name: Building
description:
To save electricity, all lights in an office building in downtown Montreal must be shut off, but the electrical wiring is a mess. You click a window to turn off the light, but sometimes that will turn on the light in another window. By clicking around, you must make out how the rooms are wired so that the lights entire building can be put out.

The game runs in a window on the Workbench and is entirely mouse controlled.

shot.caption: After having turned off some rooms on the first floor, some random windows have also turned dark
What? It didn't go out, instead it turned on two other rooms.
The game runs in a window and can be resized
